Proficient in Python and Django web frameworks, with expertise in database management systems and front-end technologies. Familiar with version control systems and containerization tools like Git and Docker. Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work independently in busy environments and also within teams to achieve project goals.

projects.title: COINMAC SMS
projects.description: A bulk sms app that helps the users send bulk messages to each other mobile number

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Collaborating with the front-end development team to develop user-facing features and ensure seamless integration with the back-end systems.
Designing and developing efficient and scalable APIs to power the front-end user interface and external integrations.
Debugging and troubleshooting issues with the back-end systems, including databases, servers, and other infrastructure components.
Developing and maintaining automated tests to ensure code quality and prevent regressions.
Documenting technical specifications and creating user manuals to help users navigate the system.
Continuously learning new technologies and tools to improve the overall performance, scalability, and user experience of the system.
Collaborating with other teams, such as product management and quality assurance, to ensure that the system meets the business requirements and user needs.

experience.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Developed and improved software modules to fix bottlenecks in the system, resulting in a 20% improvement in load time.
Updated old code bases to modern development standards, reducing operating costs and improving functionality.
Deployment of web applications with NGINX using Linux.
Using Celery as task queue and RABBITMQ, REDIS as message brokers to execute tasks.
Developed entire front-end and back-end modules using Python and Django web frameworks.
Involved in designing user interactive webpages as the front-end part of the web application using various web technologies.
Collaborated with internal teams to convert end-user feedback into meaningful and improved solutions, which helped improve client satisfaction.
Improved the SEO of the web applications and added features that collected site visitors' information, resulting in a 50% increase in sales of products and services through email.
Mentoring junior developers and helping them to develop their skills and knowledge in back-end development.
Consumed APIs while utilising python requests to read numerous JSON reports.
Worked with project sponsors to define projects specs, timeline and milestones.
Integrated a payment gateway into software products.

experience.company: NIGER STATE BOARD OF INTERNAL REVENUE, MINNA, NIGER STATE
experience.title: INTERN

Registration of Tax payers for TAX IDENTIFICATION NUMBER (TIN)

Increased general productivity by training staff to properly utilize enterprise software used within the organization.
Was the primary point of contact for all customer queries about their Tax Identification number
Explained technical information in clear terms to non-technical individuals to promote better understanding.
Sorted and organized materials such as physical files, tracking spreadsheets and reports.
Responsible for escalating logged queries to the right department
